content:
Andhra Special Sweet Recipe: Sunnundalu/ Minapappu Laddu Servings: 12 Duration: 15 mins Authentic, Healthy and simple to make Sweet which is rich in protein, vitamins and minerals. This dessert main ingredient is Urad Dal , it is processed raw black gram ( black lentils) Â Urad Dal contains high protein and minerals than other Dal ( lentils ) you can check out detailed information below: Nutrition facts of Urad Dal: Minerals: Iron, Calcium, Magnesium, potassium and sodiumÂ  Vitamin: B6 It contains high fiber and proteinÂ  It's is an traditional sweet recipe and famous in Andhra , India ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³Â Coming Sunday, our new year it's called "Ugadi " On this special day, we make many varieties of sweets, snacks and 'Ugadi Pachadi'. I hope you can checkout my sweets and snack recipes and make your festival with great dishes. Recipes with Urad Dal:
  • Minapappu Garellu/ Urad Dal Vada/ Medu vada|| Krishna Janmashtami Spl
  • Minapappu Pachadi / Urad Dal Chutney ðŸ‘Œ
Ingredients:
  • Urad Dal / Minapappu - 160 gms
  • Granulated sugar - 100 gms ( powdered )
  • Fine Cane sugar - light brown - 80 gms
  • Ghee - 40 ml
  • Fried cashew nuts - chopped - 3 tb sp
Procedure:
  • Dry roast Urad Dal in a pan over low to medium heat
  • Roast till golden brown ( stir continuously to avoid burnt ) turn off heat
  • Transfer them in a plate, let them become cool
  • Blend them into fine & smooth powder
  • Add blended powder in mixing bowl
  • Then add rest of the ingredients
  • Mix well and make round shaped balls
  • Store in an airtight container to remain fresh
  • Serve to family members and enjoy your day ðŸ™‚
  • Happy Cooking & have a good day
